column1: "description": "The table shows the Gross Capital Formation from Budgetary Resources of the Central Government of India since the First Five-Year Plan (1951-52 to 1955-56). It gives details of Gross capital formation by the Central Government and Gross financial assistance for capital formation."
"title": "Download XLS for Gross Capital Formation from Budgetary Resources of the Central Government(External Link that opens in a new window)"
